channel.title: [PI] need an urgent fix
channel.description:
I tried adding the completely rewrite drop system. http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-server/tutorials/251287-completely-rewrite-drops-pi.html
Msn is antonyharding2255@hotmail.com i'll do pastebin if needed. I got this error in NpcHandler.java

item.title: [PI] need an urgent fix
item.dc:creator: @extinct2255 extinct2255
item.description:
@extinct2255 wrote:

No i did not sir.

You prob cant find it because of this

That’s the code.

if (npcs[i].npcType == 4278 || npcs[i].npcType == 4279 || npcs[i].npcType == 4280 || npcs[i].npcType == 4281 || npcs[i].npcType == 4282 || npcs[i].npcType == 4283 || npcs[i].npcType == 4284)) {
c.sendMessage("You gain some tokens.");
}
			if(npcs[i].npcType == 4291 || npcs[i].npcType == 4292 && c.inCyclops) {
				int random2 = Misc.random(25);
				if(random2 == 1) {
					Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.getWarriorsGuild().getCyclopsDrop(c), npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, 1, c.playerId);
				}
			}
